name: Sustenance
effect: This spell allows the mage to sustain her physical body with food and drink consumed while in the Dreamtime. The rote is cast on food and drink gathered in the Dreamtime and will affect enough material to provide the caster with one meal. Too much time spent in the Anima Mundi without consuming food and drink will lead to deprivation.

rotes.roteDescription: This rote is performed just as the spell, above.

notes: The dice pool of the rote uses the lowest spell pool of either Life or Spirit.
